<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" version="1.0" demote-non-dropping-particle="sort-only" default-locale="en-US">
    <!-- This style was edited with the Visual CSL Editor (http://editor.citationstyles.org/visualEditor/) -->
    <info>
        <title>BibTeX ACM citation style</title>
        <id>http://www.zotero.org/styles/bibtex-acm-citation-style</id>
        <link href="http://www.zotero.org/styles/bibtex-acm-citation-style" rel="self"/>
        <link href="http://www.bibtex.org/" rel="documentation"/>
        <author>
            <name>Markus Schaffner</name>
        </author>
        <contributor>
            <name>Richard Karnesky</name>
            <email>karnesky+zotero@gmail.com</email>
            <uri>http://arc.nucapt.northwestern.edu/Richard_Karnesky</uri>
        </contributor>
        <category citation-format="author-date"/>
        <category field="generic-base"/>
        <updated>2018-06-11T10:52:49+00:00</updated>
        <rights license="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/">This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License</rights>
    </info>
    <macro name="zotero2bibtexType">
        <choose>
            <if type="BILL BOOK GRAPHIC LEGAL_CASE LEGISLATION MOTION_PICTURE SONG" match="any">
                <choose>
                    <if genre="rfc"  match="any">
                       <text value="rfc"/>
                    </if>
                     <else-if  genre="bibliography" match="any">
                        <text value="bibliography"/>
                    </else-if>
                    <else-if  genre="play_drama" match="any">
                        <text value="playdrama"/>
                    </else-if>
                    <else-if  genre="proceeding" match="any">
                        <text value="proceedings"/>
                    </else-if>
                    <else>
                       <text value="book"/>
                    </else>
                </choose>
            </if>
            <else-if type="CHAPTER" match="any">
                <text value="inbook"/>
            </else-if>
            <else-if type="ARTICLE ARTICLE_JOURNAL ARTICLE_MAGAZINE ARTICLE_NEWSPAPER" match="any">
                <text value="article"/>
            </else-if>
            <else-if type="THESIS" match="any">
                <choose>
                    <if variable="genre">
                        <text variable="genre" text-case="lowercase" strip-periods="true"/>
                    </if>
                </choose>
                <text value="thesis"/>
            </else-if>
            <else-if type="PAPER_CONFERENCE" match="any">
                <text value="inproceedings"/>
            </else-if>
            <else-if type="REPORT" match="any">
                <text value="techreport"/>
            </else-if>
            <else-if type="DATASET" match="any">
                <choose>
                    <if genre="software"  match="any">
                       <text value="software"/>
                    </if>
                    <else>
                       <text value="dataset"/>
                    </else>
                </choose>
            </else-if>
            <else>
                <text value="misc"/>
            </else>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="citeKey">
           <text variable="call-number"/>
    </macro>
    <macro name="editor-short">
        <names variable="editor">
            <name form="short" delimiter=":" delimiter-precedes-last="always"/>
        </names>
    </macro>
    <macro name="author-short">
        <names variable="author">
            <name form="short" delimiter=":" delimiter-precedes-last="always"/>
        </names>
    </macro>
    <macro name="issued-year">
        <date variable="issued">
            <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
    </macro>
    <macro name="issued-month">
        <choose>
            <if type="ARTICLE" match="any">
                <date variable="issued">
                    <date-part name="month" form="short" strip-periods="true" text-case="lowercase"/>
                </date>
            </if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="issue-date">
        <choose>
            <if type="ARTICLE ARTICLE_JOURNAL" match="any">
                <choose>
                    <if variable="source">
                        <text variable="source"/>
                    </if>
                    <else>
                        <date date-parts="year-month" form="text" variable="issued"/>
                    </else>
                </choose>
            </if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="author">
        <names variable="author">
            <name sort-separator=", " delimiter=" and " delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all"/>
            <label form="long" text-case="capitalize-first"/>
        </names>
    </macro>
    <macro name="editor-translator">
        <names variable="editor translator" delimiter=", ">
            <name sort-separator=", " delimiter=" and " delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all"/>
            <label form="long" text-case="capitalize-first"/>
        </names>
    </macro>
    <macro name="title">
        <choose>
            <if genre="proceeding" match="any">
                <text variable="container-title-short" suffix=": "/>
                <text variable="title" text-case="title"/>
            </if>
            <else-if type="ARTICLE_JOURNAL" match="none">
                <text variable="title" text-case="title"/>
            </else-if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="volume">
        <choose>
            <if type="ARTICLE BOOK ARTICLE_JOURNAL" match="any">
                <text variable="volume" prefix="volume = {" suffix="}"/>
            </if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="DOI">
        <choose>
            <if type="ARTICLE PAPER_CONFERENCE" match="any">
                <text variable="DOI" prefix="doi = {" suffix="}"/>
            </if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="abstract">
        <if match="any" variable="abstract">
            <text variable="abstract"/>
        </if>
    </macro>
    <macro name="URL">
        <text variable="URL" prefix="url = {" suffix="}"/>
    </macro>
    <macro name="container-title">
        <choose>
            <if type="CHAPTER PAPER_CONFERENCE" match="any">
                <text variable="container-title" prefix="booktitle = {" suffix="}" text-case="title"/>
            </if>
            <else-if type="ARTICLE ARTICLE_JOURNAL" match="any">
                <text variable="container-title" prefix="journal = {" suffix="}" text-case="title"/>
            </else-if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="pages">
        <group delimiter=",
">
            <choose>
                <if match="any" variable="collection-number">
                    <text variable="collection-number" prefix="articleno = {" suffix="}"/>
                </if>
                <else>
                    <text variable="page" prefix="pages = {" suffix="}"/>
                </else>
            </choose>
            <text variable="number-of-pages" prefix="numpages = {" suffix="}"/>
        </group>
    </macro>
    <macro name="edition">
        <text variable="edition"/>
    </macro>
    <macro name="editor">
        <choose>
            <if match="any" type="THESIS">
                <names variable="editor" delimiter=", " prefix="advisor = {" suffix="}">
                    <name delimiter=" and " delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all"/>
                </names>
            </if>
            <else>
               <names variable="editor" delimiter=", " prefix="editor = {" suffix="}">
                   <name delimiter=" and " delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all"/>
               </names>
            </else>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <macro name="keyword">
        <choose>
            <if type="ARTICLE PAPER_CONFERENCE DATASET" match="any">
                <text variable="keyword" prefix="keywords = {" suffix="}"/>
            </if>
        </choose>
    </macro>
    <citation et-al-min="11" et-al-use-first="10" disambiguate-add-year-suffix="true" disambiguate-add-names="false" disambiguate-add-givenname="false" collapse="year">
        <layout delimiter="_">
            <text macro="citeKey"/>
        </layout>
    </citation>
    <bibliography hanging-indent="false">
        <layout>
            <group display="right-inline">
                <text macro="zotero2bibtexType" prefix="@"/>
                <group prefix="{" suffix="
}" delimiter=",
">
                    <text macro="citeKey"/>
                    <text macro="author" prefix="author = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="editor"/>
                    <text macro="title" prefix="title = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="issued-year" prefix="year = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="issue-date" prefix="issue_date = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="ISBN" prefix="isbn = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="publisher" prefix="publisher = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="publisher-place" prefix="address = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="chapter-number" prefix="chapter = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="edition" prefix="edition = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="volume"/>
                    <text variable="issue" prefix="number = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="ISSN" prefix="issn = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="archive_location" prefix="archiveLocation = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="URL"/>
                    <text macro="DOI"/>
                    <text macro="abstract" prefix="abstract = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text variable="note" prefix="note = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <text macro="container-title"/>
                    <text macro="issued-month" prefix="month = "/>
                    <text macro="pages"/>
                    <text macro="keyword"/>
                    <text variable="event-place" prefix="location = {" suffix="}"/>
                    <choose>
                        <if type="PAPER_CONFERENCE" match="any">
                            <text variable="collection-title" prefix="series = {" suffix="}"/>
                        </if>
                        <else>
                            <text variable="collection-title" prefix="collection = {" suffix="}"/>
                        </else>
                    </choose>
                </group>
            </group>
        </layout>
    </bibliography>
</style>

10.1145/3428216.abstract:
With distributed computing becoming ubiquitous in the modern era, safe distributed
programming is an open challenge. To address this, multiparty session types (MPST)
provide a typing discipline for message-passing concurrency, guaranteeing communication
safety properties such as deadlock freedom.  While originally MPST focus on the communication
aspects, and employ a simple typing system for communication payloads, communication
protocols in the real world usually contain constraints on the payload. We introduce
refined multiparty session types (RMPST), an extension of MPST, that express data
dependent protocols via refinement types on the data types.  We provide an implementation
of RMPST, in a toolchain called Session*, using Scribble, a toolchain for multiparty
protocols, and targeting F*, a verification-oriented functional programming language.
Users can describe a protocol in Scribble and implement the endpoints in F* using
refinement-typed APIs generated from the protocol. The F* compiler can then statically
verify the refinements. Moreover, we use a novel approach of callback-styled API generation,
providing static linearity guarantees with the inversion of control. We evaluate our
approach with real world examples and show that it has little overhead compared to
a naive implementation, while guaranteeing safety properties from the underlying theory.
10.1145/3428216.keyword: Multiparty Session Types (MPST), Refinement Types, Distributed Programming, F*, Code Generation
10.1145/3428216.title: Statically verified refinements for multiparty protocols
